mapper.insert: insert into cashflow_data (VERSION, FEE_TYPE, FEE_NAME, FEE_PRICE, CREATE_BY$, CREATE_DATE$, UPDATE_BY$, UPDATE_DATE$) values (#{report1MonthVersion, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, "admin", current_date, null, null)
mapper.select: select distinct CAST(CREATE_DATE$ as char) as "CREATE_DATE$" from cashflow_data order by CREATE_DATE$
select IFNULL(${report4Type}, 'Others') AS legend from cashflow_data group by IFNULL(${report4Type}, 'Others') order by IFNULL(${report4Type}, 'Others')
